conversation.text: Based on your preference for world war i movies, I would recommend ' Flags of Our Fathers'. This film explores the lives of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a significant event in World War II. Starring notable actors like Barry Pepper and Robert Patrick, it offers a poignant and historical perspective on the conflict.

This classic film tells the story of a group of British soldiers facing off against numerically superior Zulu warriors during the 1879 Anglo-Zulu War. With great performances by actors like Conrad Kemp and Tanya van Graan, 'Zulu' provides an engaging historical drama.
